content.detailedDescription:
the following occurred on dec. 17th of 05. i started my work day early in the a.M. hours back then. this particular night was clear, cold and a little snow on the ground.I was taking my two german shepherds out back to lock them inside my fenced yard. they entered the yard and my big shepherd turned towards me and whined while looking up.
i was just starting to latch the gate and looked up to see what he was whining about and seen a large, triangular craft just barely moving above me.I felt that i could hit it with a rock. it was that close. it was so huge that it seemed like it was closer than it was.The sky was lit up perfectly that night from the reflection of the lights from indianapolis,( i lived about 17 miles out west of indy)and this thing was just floating silently above me.I got a good look at it. it looked thick, like a giant airliner, and was very long. the length from corner to corner at the rear was shorter than the length from the rear to front.I can't even guess as to how big it was. there was a large, thick circular object on the bottom with one light in the middle of it.It had areas of different depth to it also. the under belly had different depths to it also. mostly around the outer edges but some on the inner part of it too.It was so huge and close that i could have held one of my trash can lids at arms length and still be able to see most of it.I don't remember light colors that were on it, but there were not very many. at least four minutes passed when by then both dogs were acting up but not barking. i looked back at them and to finish latching the gate. i looked back up but didn't see it until i looked over towards the east, which would have been the n.W. side of indianapolis and there it was. the craft had suddenly traveled 15 to 20 miles and was higher in the sky. it then banked to the left and up and was gone in a flash. it was almost as if it just disappeared after it traveled a short distance because it was gone so fast.Although i have forgotten certain details, the size and quietness of this craft has never left me.
i never felt anything but awe and how eerie it was to be so close, traveling slow and silent as if it was floating. i did not feel any energy or anything of the kind coming from it.I did not hear anything from the sudden burst of speed it had to of used when i had to search for it after looking away to latch my gate.
this was the second time i had seen one of these. the other was when i was traveling east on i-70 coming through nebraska way back in 91. i drove over the road truck driving then and several of us that were traveling in a convoy seen it to the south. we were all running fast until one of them yelled through the c.B. radio real excitedly for us to look south. we all stopped and watched for about 5 or 6 min. until it went out of site.It was traveling about the height of what helicopters travel and was real far away but still looked huge.
content.summary: Side length longer than across rear. thick, large circular object on bottom. lighted corners and middle.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving south on 465 by the airport something felt like look over here and when i  looked to the west and seen a round sphere reflecting rainbow light but just within the cirle of the sphere and there was light cloud movement to the east and the sphere didnt move or change postion to the north of the sun i took pictures and we kept watching it until we turned on a road to the west and the sphere could still be seen from that angle as well and we went in the house and u still could viewthe object not sure how much longe it was visible it has ben on my mind ever since then the pics i took u can diffently see the sphere in to the sun and we were even drvng 60mph and u can see the light trailers for the sphere as with the sun in the picture it was something there that wasnt moving and it looked like to me a sheild  of some sort reflecting the sun rays will get pictures on here soon
content.summary: Round sphere north of the sun reflecting rainbow light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was up getting water ,i looked out my window and i saw a large white gloving object it was traveling ne down chamblee tucker road. it was roof top level. it seemed solid and white liminius glow. it was traveling at about 45 mils an hour or slower. kept same path until i lost it.
it did keep me up for a while. my husband said that he had heard noises go over the house, no planes or helecopters.
content.summary: Looked out back window,saw a white large object,move to my right followed it it was roof level. traveling down chamblee tucker rd.

content.detailedDescription:
My sighting took place on december 20th,2008 at around 7:35-7:40pm.
it was a rather warm night and i had my top down on my audi convertible. i was parked in a parking lot in the middle of the galleria shopping area in uptown houston.  i had a date that night and we were suppossed to meet at 7:30.  she called to say she was running late and to make it 7:45.
i parked in the lot to kill time.  while listening to the radio i just happened to glance up to the sky.  it was a relatively clear night with some lingering clouds in the area.  however, i looked up just in time to see this bright white object jetting across the sky.  this was the fastest thing i had ever seen and the sighting lasted about 4-6 seconds.  the object was fairly low, but high above the skyline of buildings in the area.  it came out of nowhere and quickly disapeared from sight as it entered a group of darker clouds.  i thought i would be able to see the light from the object through the thin clouds, but it simply vanished.  the white color was almost like a solid color.  it was not like lights from a plane or a street lights or anything that i can say i've seen before.  it was a solid light.  no flashing.  i have seen several falling stars and meteorites, but this object had no tail.  i thought it odd that if it were a falling star, it wasn't really falling, it was flying in a level trajectory. it wasn't breaking apart into the atmosphere either.
i also thought if it was a meteorite it surely would have crashed in a very populated area,yet no sounds or visuals to confirm that.
in the short time i witnessed this object i can honestly say i don't know what it was, but in my opinion this was an object that was under some kind of navigational control.  the impression i had was it was a flying, solid object flying on it's own power.
the object was shaped like an excedrin tablet/capsule and again a solid white illumination.
this incident happened for only seconds, but i think i saw something extraordinary and it has been on my mind ever since.
content.summary: Witnessed a bright white object traveling at tremendous speed in the galleria area of uptown houston.  amazing speed as object came out of nowhere.  lost track of the object as it entered cloud cover.

content.detailedDescription: We've seen alot of star camoflaged objects . mostly in spring,the video tells more than i can say and i hate typing.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I video taped this event because we've seen it many times.Just wanted to know if you'd like to see it

content.detailedDescription: I went outside around 9:15 and saw an upside down triangle shaped object in the western sky. it changed from blue to gold to silver, and then faded to no color, but you could still see light reflecting off of it like glass. i preceding to get my cell phone and took a series of pictures. i came in for a minute to see if my mother could come outside. she couldn't. when i came back outside it was glowing very brightly. i saw another object leave the main object at a slow rate of speed. it had a diamond shape and had a bright light on top(you can see it in one of the pictures) (the bright gold in one of the pictures is a streetlight).
content.summary: I went outside and saw and upside-down shaped object from my backyard.

content.detailedDescription: +walking with girl, ( hand & hand) looking at stars. watched shooting star, we though but in a matter ove couple seconds it went from pin point of light ,to  maybe couple of hundred feet across . right over us. we were so scard we though it was going to hit us. but just as fast as it came, it stoped and went back up and disapired. told my parents when i got back home. they told me never tell any one. they would say i was crazy. also my brother had encounter with one when in service, and was sworn to be quite, and had to sign statement. under thret of court marshal or prison.  he was in marines stationed in florida. on air bass his job was in flight tower, taking weather readings, sending up baloons. this was about 1948. in latter years i tryed to get him to report it. but he became number 2 in state, in corrictions dept. ast, atorney genneral.He told me that it would not do him any good for job. he told me whole story before he passed away.  please believe me i am not a kook. i am about ready to pass on soon. so though i would tell someone.        frank bodmer   (will be 70 dec. 30 )
content.summary: Round loking from bottom, bright, off white, gray tint.

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately @ 10:48 p.M. saturday dec 27 2008 i witnessed an unusual colored golden/bronze bright light (with two opposite red lights each side that turned on shortly after) which seemed like a star or planet. having never seen such in the night sky before i continued to observe it. i was standing facing south/south east compass bearing 170 degrees (taken later for report) and looking directly upward. this bright light was near what looked like another bright star or planet as i am not a well versed astronomer so i can't describe by names. i���m sure there is available star/planet charts for date and time if made available to me i could then point out where it was that i saw this.

as i looked up at this unusual colored star it appeared to be a very large type star or planet. the light was pulsating. it then also appeared to get slightly bigger and move from side to side about in an inch square. it was then the two red small lights came on one each side. this went on for a few minutes when all of a sudden this light took off south/south east compass bearing 170 degrees at an extremely high rate of speed. no sound nor noise was heard or seen. at approximately the two o���clock position a smaller particle of the same bright light was ejected/departed the main light and they both soon disappeared into the horizon. 

how i felt... not sure... weird, stunned, amazed... i'm a retired paramedic/fireman with both military and civilian background. as a trained observer over the years i notice many things others don't. i had gone out to get a breath of fresh air and is customary i look upwards and stargaze. as i was testing out a new flashlight i only wish i had looked up a few minutes earlier to have seen more.

you may contact me if you wish but i'd like my name and contact info private. you can use my observation also.
sincerely,
content.summary: Goldish starlike light with 2 red lights opposite side hovered extremely high altitude left high speed.

content.detailedDescription: i was washing my 5 ton van in my driveway.I was using a long handled brush to reach the top half of the van side,which is why i was looking up.Out of the sw a round silver object with a red dot on the bottom, appeared, heading ne. completely silent. the airport is in that direction so i'm familiar with planes going the same way. that is how i was able to guess the size and speed. i watched it until it disappeared into the clouds over the mountains to the ne, about 50 miles or so away. as it flew, it never varied it's course or speed. i wanted to call someone to report it, but i had no idea who to contact. i had never heard of mufon until tonight on coast to coast, so i thought i might as well send it in.
content.summary: Sw to ne /silent / 1000ft/ 300mph/ clear sky / light wind.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the the stars from my deck on a typical beautiful hawaiian night on the big island of hawaii when i saw a shooting star cross the sky. i was looking up into the sky towards the east and the "star" flashed from north to south. not a big deal................Until it came to an instantaous stop and remained for more than 15 minutes. i did not blink for that 15 minutes, hoping it would move again and i didn't want to lose it, but it did not move again. my eyes began getting very dry and the object was not moving anymore, so i went back into the house.
content.summary: I was looking at the stars on a dark and starry night.

content.detailedDescription:
The other man that reported a sighting from mission viejo, ca may be on to something. his photo's look to be the same that i witnessed. this event is why i am on this site. 

i walked outside for the last time that night at about 2am and noticd an abnormal bright light in the sky toward the south and took a moment to look at it. after about two minutes the light seemed to change shape and colors very quickly. it seemed to be about 3-5 miles away and about 4-6 thousand feet frm the ground. i know that atmospheric gasses can cuase this illusion on a star so i took the time to really focus on it, and did see that it did change size and shape. to make certain this was not a star, i then proped myslf against a solid wall and looked at it through a tree to see any movement. much to my suprise it did move from right to left and up and down. very subtle movements though, besides the natural movement of the earth of course. i could only watch it for an hour and had to go in and sleep. the lights flickering on and off made it to look as though it had a triangular shape. if it was a star, it's not there tonight.

loren
content.summary: Bright lights, red, green and blue.

content.detailedDescription:
There was no air conditioning in those days, and my family and i were sitting under a shade tree on the east side of our house. we first noticed the object in a fluttering descent from west to east, approximately 1/4 of a mile northwest of the house. it went out of site behind our barn for a few seconds, then continued to descend until it was at at tree-top level with a wooded area located to the northeast of our location. the ufo made a 90degree left turn and flew into an opening between our woods and our neighbors', still descending. my father believed a small airplane had just crashed, and he and i ran the quarter mile to the woods in the heat of an august afternoon.  we found nothing, no wreckage, no broken tree limbs, nothing! i have no memory of its shape. the color was dull grey, and i destinctly remember the fluttering motion which reminded me of a kite with a broken string.  

there were five of us, father, mother (both deceased) two younger sisters and myself.
content.summary: Ufo appeared to crash in wooded area a quarter mile from observers.

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting in the carls jr. restaurant on marconi avenue in sacramento, near the corner of eastern avenue and mission avenue. while talking to my wife i noticed that below tree level in the distance there was a cigar shaped ufo cruising. i saw it cruise between trees and when i had looked to see if it would reappear between other trees it did not reappear. it looked like the fuselage of a large airliner but had no wings or tail and it was flying too low to be an airplane. i estimate that it was about half a mile from my location and it was traveling from east to west. if it was at the distance that i thought it to be at i estimate that it would have been a hundred feet off of the ground. it had no lights and appeared to be a dark gray color on the bottom with a light gray color on the top. i chose to mark that it was cigar shaped because i saw only the side of the object but my conclusions are that it was disk shaped but a thick disk, long, convex on the top and bottom and with flat edges. i am a field invesitgator with mufon and state that what i have described is as accurate as i can recount. to my knowledge, nobody else in the restaurant observed the object. my wife had her back to the event and it happened quite quickly.
content.summary: Cigar shape ufo seen at tree level.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a sky watcher, everytime i get a chance i hope to see something up there and for years have never seen anything. right now if i look out my window the object is still there. but i came in to recharge my cameras and report this to mufon.. anyone in the oc area should be able to see this right now in the south west sky....

i dont think this was a satellite. definately not a plane, helicopter or star either. constantly changes position and i filmed it for a solid hour. i have over 100 still photos as well all with points of reference. 

i really want to pass on this footage to someone who can analyze the date/time with military and/or satellite position records. guys! contact me i think i have found something.

my video shows constant movement, changing in color and shape and pulsing bright lights.

in the still photographs you can see the position changing in corolation to the stars in the foreground. this is phenominal footage and i took pictures of me taking video and i took video of me taking pictures. i tried to document well so that sceptics would not think im a scammer or anything. 

i shot the video in high definition and with a camera that has a 40x's zoom. my digitial still camera is 12.1 megapixel..

i am attaching photos in sequential order taken only 1 or 2 seconds apart from eachother. this is the real deal

ok im so excited im going back outside. someone please contact me for my footage. thanks
content.summary: Light in the sky, hovering/moving slowly. i documented well with photos and video.

content.detailedDescription: At 7:04pm on 12/28/08 i walked outside w/ my infant child and his mother to go to her car. i noticed an incredibally bright white object in the north west sky at approximately 40 degrees above the horizon. i pointed this out to her, and i said what is that.I commented to her that i knew that a few weeks back three planets were alligned w/ the moon, but i thought that was in the eastern sky. she left and i contnued to watch the object untill 7:15, when i called a friend to see if he could see it. he could not get outside. i went inside, called 411 and called vandenburg afb. they had no info. i called edwards afb but was unable to reach anyone. i called 411 again and called kabc channel 7 news. they said they had no info. i returned outside, approximately 7:30 and the object was in the same place and was still the same level of intense brightness.  at this point i remembered that i had some binoculars in my vehicle, and thinking that they would help, i retrieved them.  i remember thinking this whole time that there must be some rational easy explanation for this thing i was seeing in the sky. a helicopter, or blimp, or planet. at this point,7:40, i was talking to a friend in new mexico on the cell phone, and he's telling me it's a weather ballon reflecting the sun.When i looked thru the binoculars i knew 2 things. it wasn't a planet, it was too close, and i could not identify what it was. it was still stationary, realative to the power lines across the street. it was so bright that it appeared to light up the sky underneath it. it was hard to discern it's actual shape. it was oval to the naked eye, but thru the binoculars it appeared to be tear dropped shape and oval, and bullet shaped. i think this was because it was so bright, i could not really see the object that was producing the light. at this point i thought it hasn't moved for 45 minutes, it's not going anywhere. i went inside to use the restroom and returned about 4 minutes later. i was shocked when it was not there. i walked west toward the street and saw that it had dropped untill it was about 30 degrees above the hozizon. i could not believe that i had missed its movement. at this point, to the naked eye the object was less bright and slighty orangeish, but still the brightest thing in the sky. thru the binoculars it was still to bright to clearly make out what it was. although i could not notice it's movement, probably because i was watching mostly thru the binoculars, the object continued it's descent. briefly i climed atop a retaining wall in the alley, to give me more height but at 8:11 pm i could no longer see it because it had descended too low. at this point it still looked white thru the binoculars, but it appeared more orangeish to the naked eye.
content.summary: Observed incredibly bright object in n.West sky for about one hour. it dimmed and changed color and dropped untill it was out of my sight.

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I had notice a very bright object in the sky in late november, approximately nov. 26th. in the sky above northwest indiana. there was a smaller, much dimmer object close to the bright object as well. i noticed it and was a taken aback a bit because the object was so large and bright. i had taken classes in astronomy at purdue with a telescope with high magnification before, i have seen the planets upclose, and i had never seen an object so large,bright, and close as the one i am describing. i mentioned to my boyfriend the following night on the way to kokomo,in for a family thanksgiving get together that i saw the bright object and the near by dim object in the sky. he saw it also,and the hour and half drive from porter county to kokomo, indiana, i watched the object. i thought the object was maybe the iss or satellite of some kind so i wrote it off. on thanksgiving night, my boyfriend and i drove from kokomo, in back to nw indiana and then to charlotte, mi to drop off my son with his grandmother. while on the drive, sitting in the passenger seat i noticed the objects again, and could see them all the way to charlotte, mi. again, very very bright light, but not really all that interesting. it hadn't moved or anything in a strange manner, but it did get dimmer and brighter rather quickly,eratically,and drastically, not like a star,rhythmically. after arriving home, i saw the lights, one dim and one very bright from my porch. for the next few nights both my boyfriend and i saw these two lights, not changing, but were odd. my brother called me the next day from workand asked me if i had seen weird bright lights in the sky. i had told my brother the sequence of events now being described and he said that they were visible from his work, in cedar lake, in. night after night for almost two weeks my boyfriend, brother, and i saw these lights in southwest sky. they didn't move like stars which shift in position each night slightly, it was almost as if the lights stayed stationary every night at the same time. i wouldgo out about eight o'clock to see the lights and they would be in the same spot, but the rest of the stars would not. for example, the lights were close to orion's belt at first but then as orion's belt shifted, the lights never moved. finally, having an insomniac moment on or around dec. 18th, about 4 am, i decided because i couldn't sleep, i would stare at the lights out my bedroom window. we just moved into the area and had not put up blinds yet so i could lie in my bed and see the lights. however, what i thought would be a boring bright light that would put me to sleep, turned out to be something else all together. i watched the bright object for about twenty minutes when the light started to move back and forth, like it was jumping back and forth. the object turned green, then blue and finally red. the object got dimmer to where it almost was invisible, and then got so bright i had to rub my eyes. i woke up my boyfriend to make sure i wasn't crazy and he went to another room to see what the lights were doing. he noticed too that the lights moved eratically, almost jumping and then the bright object turned a violet color and split into three separate objects. one of the "offspring" from the parent object came back to the center, fused with another "offspring" and became bright again. the third seemed to stay distant to the two fused objects and was much dimmer. after we witnessed this, the object dimmed completely and could not be seen. there was no wind that night and the object could be clearly seen from my window away from the trees. i thought the object was very strange at first because it was so bright and low in the sky. after seeing this strange split, i felt an eerie sense that this was not an object like a star or planet. again, night after night we could see the lights right above the evergreen trees just in the front of our house. until tonight, dec. 28th. the lights moved down the street above the middle school, approximately three blocks from my house and i took a video of it. i thought it was odd that after almost a month of being in the same position, it had finally moved. what was even more odd to me was the fact that i could see the object with no problem from the park near my house through the video camera, but i had to zoom in to see the other stars, and planets like venus. also, i checked the nasa iss position, and it is not visible from my house for more than six minutes, but i video taped this object for more than six minutes. i'm not a skeptic, but i am a biochemist and i wondered if any one on your team could tell me what the lights were, whether there has been a satellite in orbit for the last month, or whether this was truly unidentifiable. i plan to film the object again if it is in the sky tomorrow night. thanks!!!    

 p.S. i do have the video of the object but am unable to locate the cord to download the video off of my camera at the moment. i can give you video as soon as i find the cord though.
content.summary: Strange, very bright light in the southwest sky over indiana.

content.detailedDescription:
Walking allong the wash, 3 triangular objects flew over
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=tl8sp_vimuc
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=mueyeafgcxs
content.summary: Location is near palm springs windmill farm

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to take out the trash and i looked up at the sky to see if there were any clouds or clear.  i saw a very bright light in the southern sky over the trees.... stationary. i thought it was a star. but it was so bright. i ran inside and got my camera. when i took a picture of it it showed a round bright orb. then i zoomed my camera to the max and when i downloaded my card i had white squiggly lines instead of the orb. i lost sight of it when i went in to download my card, when i came back out it was gone. im not sure what this is but i have some photos that you might find interesting. these photos were taken tonite, my date and time was off by one day.
content.summary: White sphere in the southern sky,

content.detailedDescription: As we left the local grocery store we looked up and started wishing on the only "bright" star in the sky.  as i left my grandmothers that star was gone and the sky was dark with no signs of any stars at all.  i drive home an notice the same bright circle of light and realize it is the same thing we thought was a star.  i am watching it not move and pull over to try and take a pic and then it moves in my direction.  i also realized there was another object the same as this not far in the distance.  the way the objects were hovering and the movements blew my mind.  i called my cousin, but no one else believes me. after freaking out while on the phone i decided to drive the rest of the way home since it wasn't a good neighborhood. i wonder if anyone else seen these tonight??
content.summary: Bright light.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were in the hot tub between 3 and 4 am on sunday dec. 28, 2008 when the event took place.  i pointed out to her to look at the tops of the trees because the wind was so strong it was swaying the trees very hard and just a few seconds after she looked up there was a flash/explosion that happened in the northeastern direction.  the whole sky lit up very bright green following this flash and only lasted a split second.  i didn't see an object before or after the flash.
content.summary: Bright green flash that lit up the sky as far as i could see.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside at about 8:10 pm to give a friend a ride home as i was standing out waiting, i observed a bright light in the sky that seemed "out of place". as i continued to watch it, i realized that it was not an airplane or helicopter since it appeared to be stationary. it was also too bright to be a star or planet. the light was white. my friend came out & as he started to get in the car, i asked him to look and say what he thought it was. he said he didn't know, but that he'd seen it before. he said we should drive toward it because he wanted to know what it was &/or what was going on. at this point, i became quite anxious and definitely did not want to do that! as we drove (not towards it!), we continued to observe the "object" & noticed that it was about 20-30 miles away, but that it also seemed to have slightly descended. right after this, my friend said that it was "beaming light down", but i couldn't look away from the road at that point. when i could look again, it had apparently stopped. several seconds later, it developed a "tail" for a split-second,then streaked away at an impossible angle & speed, then was gone. the time it took for it to vanish, from "tail" to disappearance was a second or less. at the time, i didn't want to tell anyone anything for fear of ridicule, but it was just too much to keep to myself, so as soon as i got home about 20 minutes later, i told my husband, who urged me to report this, so i found this website. this is all true & i'm still shaken up.
content.summary: Saw bright light/movement of no known aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: Event occurred between 10:00 p.M. and 11:00 p.M. while flying over the state of arizona between 31,000 to 32,000 feet altitute.  i was flying from atlanta, georgia to ontario, california. i had the urge to look out the window because i wanted to see if there were any visible ground structures which would indicate to me that we were not too far away from our destination.  i first i saw the lights at quite some distance below, but thought that we were flying low enough to be able to see structures on the ground, but what caught my attention was the patterns of the lights was something i had never seen before (the appearance was like electrical discharges).  after i followed the lights below, i activated the flight map on the computer screen and it indicated that we were flying at an altitute between 31,000 to 32,000 which immediately indicated to me that we were to high above the ground to be able to view any structures on the ground.  i stopped looking out the window and just sat back and tried to make sense of what i just had seen.  within ten to fifteen minutes later i decided to look out the window again and that is when i saw the three semi-domes flying at almost our same altitute close enough to where i was able to see details of the aircraft.  i saw what appeared to be semi-dome shaped objects.  due to the darkness i was only able to see the areas that were illuminated.  there were a total of three (a smaller one in the front, a larger one in the center, and a smaller one in the rear).  our plane was travelling to the west and the objects were travelling towards the east.  they appeared to be following each other.  they were travelling to the right side of the delta aircraft at a distance where i was able to see details of the semi-dome shaped object.  the illuminated area seemed to be composed of some sort of glass or see through type of material, which were composed of several one piece  panels (five or six individual panels from top to bottom).  what appeared to me to be the strangest thing was that there was some sort of a light or electrical impulse (similar to the ones used in monitors at hospitals to monitor heart rates) which would travel counter clock wise continously across the center of what appeared to be glass panels.  i looked at these objects for quite some time trying to comprehend what i was observing.  i am an aircraft aficionado and i've watched just about every documentary on the discovery channel and national geographic aircrafts and i've never seen an aircraft similar to what i saw that evening.  due to the darkness i was not able to observe if the bottom of the objects (or base) were connected to each other or if they were all independent from each other.
content.summary: While flying a delta flight #1663 at about 31,000 to 32,000 feet altitute.

content.detailedDescription: Watching tv saw bright light in window.Went to window thought it was a star but it did not seem right.Looked again because it pulsated,very bright.Got dressed then went outside.With my boys.Got scope for better look seemed to be oval in shape with little individual lights in a oval not sure if it was the scope or object.All the while bright light would come from the top then bottom.Saw one streak of red.Tried to film it and did for 10 min but never had the rec. button on i wasnt thinking at the time so the only way i can put this down is to tell someone.That was it it was very strange.Around 8 we had to pick up my daughter from family we were already late due to me watching this thing.When we left.I watched it for awhile till i couldnt see it came back 10 15 min later sky was clear.Thats pretty much it it kinda freaked me and my boy out.
content.summary: Hovering in sky somewhat low pulsating.

content.detailedDescription: Last night of camping, we were standing around our fire when we saw a very bright light across lake.  in the boundary waters there are no bright lights across the lake.  in a matter of seconds it moved great distances.  it looked like a big headlight but just one.  we would watch it then look away and in moments it was in a very different place, very far from where we last saw it.  after some time, we lost track only to turn around and see it making its way up the cove toward us.  we were very scared and had no idea what it was.  it was about 12 inches in diameter.  it stopped and crossed the penninsula stopping over the one tent out of three where someone was in.  it hovered over that tent for some time than in a flash was gone.  the next day we told rangers about it and they told us it was a firefly???
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light in the middle of boundary waters.

content.detailedDescription: 11.20pm 27 dec 08 - we were on the road between marong and myers flat, near bendigo victoria, and we were about to leave after seeing an incredible amount of shooting stars. then my partner craig pointed to something on the north west horizon... it was this incredibly bright yellow long lights in the shape of a flat aeroplane on its side (kinda like a big mosquito). it was also very low flying, and rather large. it was moving much faster than a satelight or aeroplane, and was not flashing at all. we also noticed that it was hovering and wanning as it moved across the sky. it moved across until it was almost due west, then it flew off into the sky, towards the stars/space and disapeared. we were both really quiet for a while, and decided to go home.  it was the single most strangest thing we have ever seen. can anyone tell us what it was?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Aeroplane on its side shaped incredibly bright yellow lights - no flashing.

content.detailedDescription: It was shortly after nightfall, when i had to take the dogs out to do their business. during this time i generally watch the stars to look at the constellations and such when i noticed a very bright light coming from northern san antonio and moving southward at a very slow speed considering the altitude in which this object appeared to be flying. at first they did seemed to look like airplane landing lights due to the intensity of the white colored light, but the direction and sheer altitude made this very unlikely. the craft itself was not visible through the bright light and as the object went overhead i could see that this craft did not have the traditional red and green lights which are mandated by the faa, if the craft did have the  lights in question, they were not on, not so likely next to a major airport.  after about 10 minutes the light went dimmed and eventually disappeared as if it started to travel upward. after that moment, it was gone. it was like nothing i have ever seen before. i have seen satellite many, many times. this was not one of those times
content.summary: Bright circular light.

content.detailedDescription:
I had stopped home during my lunch hour. my husband and i lived in a rural area near benton harbor, mi. only my dog and two cats were home when this happened. i'm not sure if this happened in 1999, or the year 2000.

while standing in my kitchen there was a very large explosion nearby. it felt like it was underground or right near the surface. the entire house shook for just a second or two. i grabbed onto the counter to steady myself and my dog who had been standing in the kitchen near me scrambled a bit to steady herself.  it felt like someone nearby had either dropped something very large, or something very large had fallen over, or something right on the surface or underground had exploded. after steadying myself i ran outside to look around. i didn't hear or see anything unusual. the area was mostly rural, not many homes nearby. 
i then went back inside to call my mother-in-law who lived nearby but she was not home. on my way back to work i called my husband to tell him about it. all through the rest of the day i checked the radio on the news, the television and the newspaper. i saw nothing about an explosion. i continued to check about it for the next several days but never found anything.
the other day i caught a television story about ufo occurrences. some people in indiana had heard/felt a very large explosion. seeing the show prompted me to check the internet and share my story to see if anyone else had experienced anything similar.

thank you,
kathleen
content.summary: Felt a large explosion.

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside my car on top floor of garage, i noticed a green sphere arcing across the sky.  the duration was only a few seconds and i couldn't determine trajectory.
content.summary: Green sphere arcing through sky for a few seconds.

content.detailedDescription: we had just got out of going to see a movie. my granfather , my brother bob and his friend steve.Not much to do in a small minning town (chuquicamata) in the northern part of the andes in chile. my grandfather saw it first as he pulled the car to the side of the road. this object was massive as it silently hoovered over the main hospital of the town, which sits on a hilltop. it was a huge series of lights in a circular pattern , slowly rotating in one direction then to the next. what caught my eye is the streetlights leading up the hill and the hospital lights were all out. this object was totally silent. then it rolled on its side to where the circle was now verticle. at this point i could make out a distinct rumble. at that point the object shot over the horizon at an incredible rate of speed , leaving a gold like trail which lingered in the air before disapating. i do remember that none of us were afraid but rather excited . since , i have studied ufos my whole life. ( sorry for spelling errors, ect ).
content.summary: Mirror image of the phoenix  lights.

content.detailedDescription:
We weres traveling to a friend's house and we saw in the sky a very rare star while it was ranning.
there were not other stars in the sky and suddenly it dessapeared doing a fast movement to the side after being static for few minutes. 
it was far away but it was not an start because the light was very strong, it looked like it was under the clouds and it vanished doing a very fast move to the side so it could not be a metheorite. 
it was like a star but with a light 10 times stronger than any other. 
we were driving all the time straight to the ufo so we looked exactly when it desappeared
content.summary: rare star like ufo appeared but it vanished suddenly doing fast side move.
